newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Itron raised by Ragen Mackenzie.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Itron raised by Ragen Mackenzie.

text.p: - Ragen MacKenzie raised Itron Inc to accumulate from hold but lowered estimates, analyst Lesa Sroufe said.
- She said the stock, off 5-1/8 at 15-1/8, was now "reasonably priced."

- The brokerage estimated the company will lose $0.17 in the current fourth quarter rather than post net income of $0.05 a share. For the year that would mean a loss of $0.11 a share including a one-time charge, compared with net income of $0.79 last year.
For 1997 Ragen Mackenzie estimated the company will earn $0.65 a share, down from an earlier estimate of $0.80.
